TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit KeyInfoX509Data extends System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoClause

summary.span: 表示 XMLDSIG 或 XML 加密 元素的 子元素。

span.span: Represents an subelement of an XMLDSIG or XML Encryption element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示``元素，其中包含 X.509v3 证书信息与验证或加密密钥。The class represents the `` element that contains X.509v3 certificate information related to the validation or encryption key. 例如，``元素可能包含 X.509 证书的使用者公钥是验证密钥或终止的验证密钥的证书或其他标识符的相关的 X.509 证书中的 X.509 证书链。For example, an `` element might contain an X.509 certificate whose subject public key is the validation key, or a chain of X.509 certificates that terminate in a certificate for the validating key, or other identifiers for related X.509 certificates. 使用类无论何时需要加密或签名 XML 文档中包括 X.509 证书数据。Use the class whenever you need to include X.509 certificate data in an encrypted or signed XML document. 有关详细信息``元素，请参阅 4.4.4 节描述 XMLDSIG 规范，这是可从在 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/ World Wide Web Consortium (W3C)，或请参阅 XML 加密规范，即从可用在 www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/ W3C。For more information about the `` element, see Section 4.4.4 of the XMLDSIG specification, which is available from the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/, or see the XML Encryption specification, which is available from the W3C at www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个示例演示如何对 XML 文件使用分离的签名进行签名。The first example demonstrates how to sign an XML file using a detached signature. 第二个示例演示如何对 XML 文件使用封装签名进行签名。The second example demonstrates how to sign an XML file using an envelope signature. **示例 #1****Example #1** [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Detached#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Detached/CPP/examplecreatedetached.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Detached#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Detached/CS/examplecreatedetached.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Detached#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Detached/VB/examplecreatedetached.vb#1)] **示例 #2****Example #2** [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Envelope#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Envelope/CPP/examplecreateenvelope.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Envelope#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Envelope/CS/examplecreateenvelope.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Envelope#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Envelope/VB/examplecreateenvelope.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个示例演示如何对 XML 文件使用分离的签名进行签名。The first example demonstrates how to sign an XML file using a detached signature. 第二个示例演示如何对 XML 文件使用封装签名进行签名。The second example demonstrates how to sign an XML file using an envelope signature. **示例 #1****Example #1** [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Detached#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Detached/CPP/examplecreatedetached.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Detached#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Detached/CS/examplecreatedetached.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Detached#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Detached/VB/examplecreatedetached.vb#2)] **示例 #2****Example #2** [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Envelope#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Envelope/CPP/examplecreateenvelope.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Envelope#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Envelope/CS/examplecreateenvelope.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Envelope#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Envelope/VB/examplecreateenvelope.vb#2)]

summary.span: 将指定的颁发者名称和序列号对添加到 对象中。

span.span: Adds the specified issuer name and serial number pair to the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 序列号进行标识，每个 X.509v3 证书执行证书颁发机构颁发的证书与证书颁发机构分配的唯一序列号配对的名称。For identification, each X.509v3 certificate carries the name of the certification authority that issued the certificate paired with a unique serial number assigned by the certification authority. 方法将有关颁发者名称和序列号对信息添加到列表可通过访问的对象属性。The method adds information about an issuer name and serial number pair to a list of objects that are accessible through the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主题密钥标识符 (Ski) 是用于标识包含某些公钥的证书的速记方法。Subject key identifiers (SKIs) are a shorthand way to identify certificates that contain a certain public key.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IssuerSerials As ArrayList

summary.span: 获取表示颁发者名称和序列号对的 结构的列表。

span.span: Gets a list of structures that represent an issuer name and serial number pair.

value.span: 表示颁发者名称和序列号对的 结构的列表。

span.span: A list of structures that represent an issuer name and serial number pair.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性表示` 元素的使用的列表的 XML 数字签名中包含的结构。The property represents the ` element of an XML digital signature using a list of structures contained within. ` 元素表示的颁发者名称和序列号对，其中标识特定的 X.509v3 证书。The ` element represents an issuer name and serial number pair, which identify a specific X.509v3 certificate. X.509 证书的颁发者是颁发证书的证书颁发机构的名称。The issuer of an X.509 certificate is the name of the certification authority that issued the certificate. 证书颁发机构分配每个证书，它们会发出一个唯一的序列号。Certification authorities assign each certificate they issue a unique serial number. 你可以添加名称和序列号对使用方法。You can add a name and serial number pair using the method.

summary.span: 获取包含在 对象中的使用者密钥标识符 (SKI) 的列表。

value.span: 包含在 对象中的主题密钥标识符 (SKI) 的列表。

span.span: A list of the subject key identifiers (SKIs) contained in the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主题密钥标识符 (Ski) 是一种方法来识别包含某些公钥的证书。Subject key identifiers (SKIs) are a way to identify certificates that contain a certain public key. SKI 可以用于标识与特定的使用者的密钥对颁发的一个或多个证书。An SKI can be used to identify one or more certificates issued to a particular subject key pair.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个 X.509v3 证书包含使用者名称。Every X.509v3 certificate includes a subject name. 可以使用此名称来标识一个或多个证书。This name can be used to identify one or more certificates.
